title: PNW Mexican food chain shares secret to perfect burrito
searches: How to make a burrito at home

ingredients.Optional: 1/2 cup cooked meat (chicken, beef, or pork)

instructions: Lay a large flour tortilla on a flat surface.
Add cooked rice in a line across the center of the tortilla.
Add cooked black beans on top of the rice.
Add diced avocado, red onion, tomatoes, and cheese.
Add diced cilantro on top of all ingredients.
Fold both sides of the tortilla inwards, then roll it up tightly from top to bottom.
Heat in oven or microwave and serve hot.
